statements: SELECT * FROM PlantGenetics;
SELECT plant_name, genetic_code FROM PlantGenetics WHERE growth_stage > 5;
SELECT plant_id, plant_name, modification_status FROM PlantGenetics ORDER BY plant_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_plants FROM PlantGenetics;
SELECT AVG(growth_stage) AS average_growth FROM PlantGenetics WHERE modification_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM PlantGenetics WHERE plant_id = 1;
SELECT plant_name, growth_stage FROM PlantGenetics WHERE growth_stage > 3 ORDER BY plant_name DESC;
SELECT plant_name, genetic_code, growth_stage FROM PlantGenetics WHERE modification_status = TRUE ORDER BY growth_stage ASC;
SELECT plant_name, genetic_code, growth_stage FROM PlantGenetics WHERE plant_name LIKE 'A%' AND genetic_code IS NOT NULL;
SELECT plant_name, growth_stage FROM PlantGenetics WHERE growth_stage BETWEEN 2 AND 4;
SELECT * FROM crops;
SELECT crop_name, crop_species FROM crops ORDER BY crop_species DESC;
SELECT crop_name, origin_country FROM crops WHERE origin_country IS NOT NULL;
SELECT crop_name, JSON_VALUE(genetic_information, '$.gene_type') AS gene_type FROM crops WHERE JSON_VALUE(genetic_information, '$.gene_type') = 'GMO';
SELECT candidate_name, modification_method, confirmation_date FROM candidates_for_modification WHERE modification_method = 'CRISPR' ORDER BY confirmation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM crops WHERE origin_country='USA';
SELECT crop_name, crop_species FROM crops WHERE crop_species='Vegetable' ORDER BY crop_name ASC;
SELECT crop_name, crop_species, origin_country FROM crops WHERE genetic_information->>'color'='red' ORDER BY crop_name DESC;

SELECT crops.crop_name, candidates_for_modification.candidate_name, candidates_for_modification.modification_method FROM crops JOIN candidates_for_modification ON crops.crop_id=candidates_for_modification.crop_id;
SELECT crop_name, origin_country, genetic_information FROM crops WHERE genetic_information->>'growth_stage'='budding' AND origin_country='Canada';
SELECT * FROM crops;
SELECT crop_name, crop_species FROM crops ORDER BY crop_species DESC;
SELECT crop_name FROM crops WHERE crop_species = 'Wheat';
SELECT * FROM crops CROSS JOIN genetic_modifications;
SELECT modification_type, modification_target FROM genetic_modifications ORDER BY modification_target ASC;
SELECT * FROM crops WHERE crop_species = 'Wheat';
SELECT crop_name, genetic_traits FROM crops WHERE crop_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM crops WHERE crop_species = 'Corn' ORDER BY crop_name DESC;

SELECT crop_name, modification_type FROM crops INNER JOIN crop_modifications ON crops.crop_id = crop_modifications.crop_id INNER JOIN genetic_modifications ON crop_modifications.modification_id = genetic_modifications.modification_id;

SELECT crop_name, modification_description FROM crops INNER JOIN crop_modifications ON crops.crop_id = crop_modifications.crop_id INNER JOIN genetic_modifications ON crop_modifications.modification_id = genetic_modifications.modification_id ORDER BY crop_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM crops ORDER BY crop_name DESC;
SELECT id, crop_name, crop_origin FROM crops WHERE crop_family = 'Leguminosae';
SELECT crop_name, crop_family, crop_origin FROM crops WHERE crop_origin IS NOT NULL;
SELECT crop_name, crop_family FROM crops WHERE genetic_code IS NOT NULL ORDER BY crop_family;

SELECT c.crop_name, v.variety_name, m.modification_type FROM crops c JOIN crop_varieties v ON c.id = v.crop_id JOIN modification_history mh ON v.id = mh.crop_variety_id JOIN genetic_modifications m ON mh.modification_id = m.id;
SELECT * FROM crops;
SELECT crop_name, crop_family FROM crops WHERE crop_origin='USA';
SELECT crop_name, crop_family, crop_origin, genetic_code FROM crops WHERE crop_name='Corn';
SELECT crop_name, crop_family, variety_name, variety_description FROM crops JOIN crop_varieties ON crops.id = crop_varieties.crop_id;

SELECT crop_name, crop_family, modification_type, modification_description FROM crops JOIN crop_varieties ON crops.id = crop_varieties.crop_id JOIN modification_history ON crop_varieties.id = modification_history.crop_variety_id JOIN genetic_modifications ON modification_history.modification_id = genetic_modifications.id;
SELECT * FROM crop_species;
SELECT species_id, species_name FROM crop_species ORDER BY species_name DESC;
SELECT marker_id, marker_name, chromosome FROM genetic_markers WHERE chromosome = 3;
SELECT lab_id, lab_name FROM research_labs WHERE lab_name LIKE 'Lab%';
SELECT sample_id, species_id, marker_id, genotype FROM crop_samples WHERE genotype IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM crop_species WHERE species_id = 1;
SELECT species_name, species_id FROM crop_species ORDER BY species_name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT species_id, species_name FROM crop_samples JOIN crop_species ON crop_samples.species_id = crop_species.species_id;
SELECT * FROM crop_samples WHERE genotype LIKE '%A%' AND genotype NOT LIKE '%B%';
SELECT lab_name, analysis_result FROM research_labs JOIN lab_reports ON research_labs.lab_id = lab_reports.lab_id ORDER BY analysis_result DESC;
